headline: GM rewards shareholders following fourth-quarter results
summary: General Motors closed out 2025 with a spring in its step. The company crossed the finish line with 2.85 million vehicles sold last year, a 5.5% year-over-year increase led by the company's pickup trucks. headline: Ford Dominates Emerging Market For Compact Pickups, A Positive For Shell-Shocked Investors
Ford names head of new battery energy storage business taking over Ky. plant
summary: Ford named the head of its new battery storage endeavor, which includes repurposing the sprawling BlueOval SK plant in Hardin County. What to know.

headline: Tesla or Ford: Which Stock is Worth Buying Ahead of Q4 Earnings?
summary: Ahead of Q4 earnings, F's sales momentum, hybrid demand and earnings beat history stack up better than TSLA's amid delivery declines and valuation pressure.

headline: Lisa Drake Appointed President, Ford Energy; Will Launch New Battery Energy Storage Business
summary: DEARBORN, Mich., January 27, 2026--Ford Motor Company today named Lisa Drake president, Ford Energy, effective immediately. She will report to John Lawler, vice chair. Drake will launch the company’s battery energy storage systems (BESS) business, the formation of which was announced in December 2025.

headline: GM Stock Jumps on Solid 2026 Outlook and Dividend Hike
summary: GM reports fourth-quarter operating profit of $2.8 billion from sales of $45.3 billion. Wall Street was looking for an operating profit of $2.8 billion from sales of $46.2 billion.

headline: General Motors Q4 Earnings Surpass Expectations, Rise Y/Y
summary: GM's Q4 adjusted EPS beats estimates and rises Y/Y as GMNA, GMI and GM Financial revenues top expectations despite lower total revenues.

headline: U.S. Carmaker Atop 76% Rally Enters Buy Zone On Outlook, Dividend Hike
summary: GM stock is up more than 70% since April and is poised to continue its rally after beating Q4 earnings estimates.

headline: ECD Autodesign Showcases A Range Rover Classic Nostalgic of The ‘80s Family Station Wagon But With 800-Horsepower
summary: KISSIMMEE, Fla., Jan. 27, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- ECD Auto Design, the world’s largest Land Rover and Jaguar restoration company known for its bespoke Defenders, Range Rovers, Jaguar E-Types, Ford Mustangs, Toyota FJs, Porsche 911s and the ECDXCTC INEOS Grenadier and Defender II, produces Project Belltown, a long-wheelbase Range Rover Classic that is a visceral reminder of why driving once felt personal, mechanical, and deeply rewarding. headline: This U.S. Automaker Just Rallied 76%; Eyes A Buy Zone On Earnings
summary: GM stock is up more than 70% since April and is poised to continue its rally after beating Q4 earnings estimates.

headline: General Motors (GM) Q4 Earnings Top Estimates
summary: General Motors (GM) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +14.24% and -1.83%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: GM expects to top Ford in U.S. vehicle production as it faces up to $4 billion in tariff costs
summary: The 2026 tariff costs would be in line with the automaker's $3.1 billion in tariff costs last year, despite the levies not being in effect for all of 2025.

headline: Is Wall Street Bullish or Bearish on Ford Motor Stock?
summary: Ford Motor has outpaced the broader market over the past year, though analysts remain cautious about its future outlook.

headline: Suzuki agrees to sell Thai assembly plant to Ford
summary: Decision to end local production follows plunging output and surging competition from Chinese automakers.

headline: Does Ford (F) Reflect Its True Value After 39% One Year Share Price Gain?
summary: Wondering whether Ford Motor's current share price reflects its true worth, or if the market is mispricing this long-established automaker? You are not alone. Over the past year the stock has returned 39.1%, with a 1% gain over 30 days and a 1.2% decline over the last week, which can change how investors view both its growth potential and risk. Recent attention on Ford has focused on its push into electric and hybrid vehicles, as well as ongoing union and labor cost discussions that affect...
